```{.r .cell-code}
library(datasets)
data(iris)
set.seed(123)
km <- kmeans(iris[, 1:4], centers = 3)
iris$Cluster <- as.character(km$cluster)
jsonlite::write_json(iris, "iris_clusters.json", pretty = TRUE, auto_unbox = TRUE)
```
:::


## ðŸŒ Visualisation interactive (Observable JS)

```{ojs}
import { FileAttachment } from "@observablehq/stdlib"

// Force la dÃ©pendance sur le bloc R
await Promises.delay(1000);  // Donne un dÃ©lai de sÃ©curitÃ©
iris_data = FileAttachment("iris_clusters.json").json()
```

```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(iris_data, {
      x: d => d["Sepal.Length"],
      y: d => d["Petal.Length"],
      fill: d => d.Cluster,
      title: d => d.Species
    })
  ],
  color: { legend: true },
  x: { label: "Longueur SÃ©pale" },
  y: { label: "Longueur PÃ©tale" },
```
